text: Ruovesi is a municipality in Pirkanmaa, Finland. As of 31 December 2021, the municipality had a population of 4,154. Nearby municipalities are Juupajoki, Mänttä-Vilppula, Orivesi, Tampere, Virrat and Ylöjärvi. Most people speak Finnish. Helvetinjärvi National Park is in Ruovesi. The biggest lake in the area of the municipality is Lake Ruovesi. == Other websites == * Municipality of Ruovesi – Official website Category:Municipalities of Pirkanmaa
title: Ruovesi
